DOC.detailed_description: This study design 12-week , prospective , open label trial , include 24 session EAA/T . Forty six subject aasigned 12 week EAA/T drug therapy , various clinical test administer baseline EAA/T drug therapy . Assessments include investigator-administered ADHD-Rating Scale ( ARS-I ) , Clinical Global Impressions - Severity scale ( CGI-S ) , Clinical Global Impressions - Improvement scale ( CGI-I ) , Gordon Diagnostic System ( GDS ) , Korea-Child Behavior Checklist ( K-CBCL ) , Self-Esteem Scale ( SES ) , Bruininks-Oseretsky test motor proficiency , second edition ( BOT-2 ) , quantitative electroencephalography ( QEEG ) functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) study . This study two objective . The first objective investigate clinical effect equine-assisted activity therapy ( EAA/T ) treat attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) . For one , determine treatment response rate primary outcome measure . The treatment response define ≥ 30 % decline baseline ARS-I score CGI-I score 1 2 endpoint . The second objective compare clinical effect EAA/T drug therapy child ADHD .
